Name: Queue Family Indices
Description: The queue family indices class keeps track of the queue families that we will call commands on in order to render objects and present them to the window.

Variables.Name: graphicsFamily
Variables.Description: The index of the graphics queue which will be used to preform rendering objects.

Variables.Name: presentFamily
Variables.Description: The index of the present queue which will be used to present immages to the window.

Methods.Name: IsComplete
Methods.Description: Returns whether or not we have found the indices of all of the necessary queues.

Returns.Description: True if we have values for the required queue families.
